documented in a book titled "The Mind Manipulators."

   • Donna Cox: An American woman who was also subjected to MKUltra's

    sensory deprivation experiments. She has spoken publicly about her

    experiences and the long-term effects of the trauma she suffered.

Victims of Hypnosis

Hypnosis was another technique used in MKUltra to control human behavior.

Researchers used hypnosis to induce a trance-like state in participants,

making them more susceptible to suggestions and manipulation.
